summary: Completed testing of Shadow Divergence UI (BLOCK 57.2). Frontend components are properly implemented with working tab navigation and URL state synchronization, but backend APIs are experiencing infrastructure issues (HTTP 520 errors from Cloudflare).

critical_bugs.issue: Returns HTTP 520 Cloudflare error - backend server connection issue
critical_bugs.impact: Shadow Divergence panel cannot load data

critical_bugs.issue: API structure mismatch - governance.status field missing (has governance.mode instead)
critical_bugs.impact: Overview tab shows error loading dashboard

infrastructure_issues.issue: Port conflict - EADDRINUSE error on startup
infrastructure_issues.symptoms: Backend logs show 'address already in use 0.0.0.0:8002'
infrastructure_issues.workaround: Backend service needs port configuration fix

integration_issues.issue: Cannot load due to backend API failures

passed_tests: Frontend /admin/fractal page loads with institutional panel header
Overview and Shadow Divergence tabs are present and clickable
URL state synchronization working - tab=shadow parameter updates correctly
Tab switching UI works - active tab styling changes properly
AdminDashboard component renders without JavaScript errors
Navigation between tabs preserves URL state
Error handling displays appropriate messages for API failures

success_percentage.backend: 0% (0/3 API endpoints working due to infrastructure issues)
success_percentage.frontend: 85% (UI components and navigation working, blocked by backend APIs)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix backend infrastructure issues. 1) Resolve port 8002 conflict for TypeScript backend 2) Fix shadow-divergence API endpoint returning HTTP 520 3) Correct admin/overview API structure (governance.status vs governance.mode) 4) Restart backend services properly. Frontend Shadow Divergence UI is correctly implemented but cannot function without working backend APIs.
